ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
Sent: Tuesday, March 21, 2000 8:05 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] emergency: please read reguarding new bard songs


From: "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...>

> I sent these to Tork, thought I would send them to the list for comment as
> well.....
>
>
> Sub 50 ideas:
> Selo's Shooting Star (39th?)
> Percussion - outdoor only
> Combination of Selo's Accelerando, Shauri's Sonorous Clouding, and
> Agilmente's Aria of Eagles + Ultravision. Party effect, Range: Zone wide.

Uhhhh... do you honestly think they'll allow this?


Why not? I can weave Selo's and Aria now. Why not throw in a song that would
just be plain fun and make group travel much easier?


> A new charm song, if not full charm then atleast a charm animal song (make
> this one 44th or 49th)

Charm animal is utterly useless (and pointless) for a bard. 90% of the
zones we go to do not have animals high enough to bother with. Remember
that our charm is already limited by the fact that we have to re-charm every
10-15 seconds. This would be better as our 39th song as well since we
"lose" our charm at 37.


Charm animal useless? Talk to the druids in Sol B that charm sonic bats all
night long.....
Also the expansion is going to have high level outdoor zones. I am sure
there will be some 50+ animals to play with.


>
> Denon's Sonic Disruption
> Target: Single
> Brass (required)
> Disrupts all spell casting from target.
> This could also be interesting as an AE song as well. If AE having it
stop
> all say/shout traffic into/out of AE (this would be interesting on the PvP
> servers).

Umm... pixie strike already accomplishes this


aye, that's why I put the addendum in about maybe having it be AE. But that
might be a bit overpowered.


>
> 50 plus songs:
>
> Denon's Dance of Death
> AE or Single
> Brass
> DoT + drain severe stamina drain(at least the equiv of a full bubble) +
> chance to interrupt any spell casting
> Dot should be twice as strong as Selo's Chords of Cessation at the same
> level.

Nice!

> Niv's Chrorus of Restoration
> String Required
> 2xHymn of Restoration + Fatigue restoral + 1.5xCassindra's Chorus of
> Clarity.
> Fully stacks with Hymn of Restoration, Cassindra's Chorus of Clarity,
Niv's
> Melody of Preservation.

Interesting but I think this would be far too powerful. twice hymn + jig +
clarity? uhh.... and stackable?

hymn x 2 at 50th would = 35 a tick healing. Not really that overpowered,
imo.
